It dodges the long and very openly declared history of Republican efforts to capture the Court and bend it to the interests of big donors.
It dodges the dark money now surrounding the Court through strategic litigation entities and amicus brief writers.
It dodges the dark money now infiltrated into the selection of Justices and into the political campaigns for their confirmation.
It dodges the undeniable pattern of the 73 5-4 partisan decisions the Roberts Five have produced helping big Republican donor interests.
It ignores that the term "restructuring" is not our word but a word taken from a public poll, which we accurately quoted.
It matches the talking points from far-right "news" outlets almost exactly, likely signaling coordination.
